Description: Counts the number of bits set to one in xmm2/m128 and puts the result in xmm1 with writemask k1.
Counts the number of bits set to one in ymm2/m256 and puts the result in ymm1 with writemask k1.
Counts the number of bits set to one in zmm2/m512 and puts the result in zmm1 with writemask k1.
Counts the number of bits set to one in xmm2/m128 and puts the result in xmm1 with writemask k1.
Counts the number of bits set to one in ymm2/m256 and puts the result in ymm1 with writemask k1.
Counts the number of bits set to one in zmm2/m512 and puts the result in zmm1 with writemask k1.
Extract values in xmm2 using control bits of xmm3/m128 with writemask k2 and leave the result in mask register k1.
Extract values in ymm2 using control bits of ymm3/m256 with writemask k2 and leave the result in mask register k1.
Extract values in zmm2 using control bits of zmm3/m512 with writemask k2 and leave the result in mask register k1.
